name: Break The System
description:
Greetings, the Chosen One!

You are working in the Space Limited, the corporation that had devoured half the world.

The goal is to find a way to break the system that literally controls all those poor people and destroy the totalitarian regime of the Space Limited.

The only way to do so, however, is to make them run out of space on their hard drives... So make them overload their databanks with complicated AI of their guards and complex machinery and office simulation! Make the system break!

Controls:

A - move left

D - move right

S - crouch

Space - jump

Left Mouse Button Tap - pick / drop item

Left Mouse Button Hold/Release - use carried item
